name: Chernoshima Nuclear Safety Engineer
description:
You are a nuclear safety engineer at the ill-named nuclear power plant Chernoshima. You are awakened from your nap by blaring sirens! The reactor is in danger of melting down! It is your job to stop it, by using your programmable Mk.1 repair drone!

Use arrow keys to move and space to interact with your drone. Program waypoints into the drone, and bring it to the control panel where you can initiate the emergency shutdown procedures, before the whole plant melts down!

Made for Global Game Jam 2017.

Note: Play in full screen!!
